title: Movie dataset
text:
movie dataset
load movie dataset from RDatasets.jl package
# utils.jl
using Tidier
using RDatasets
movies = dataset("ggplot2", "movies");

include("utils.jl")
@chain movies begin
    @slice(1:5)
end

title: @select
section: 从 DataFrame 中选取 5 列数据
text:
从 DataFrame 中选取 5 列数据

@chain movies begin
    @select(title, year, length, budget, rating)
    @slice(1:5)
end

title: @rename
text:
rename using @rename()

@chain movies begin
    @rename(name = title, minutes = length)
    @select(1:5)
    @slice(1:5)
end
